XXpplg1__u:331: vyāpādacittam utsraṣṭukāmena kausīdyacittaṃ dauṣprajñacittam anutpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:332: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvasattvān dānamaye puṇyakṛyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena śīlamaye bhāvanāmaye vaiyāpṛtyasahagate sarvauṣadhikasahagate puṇyakṛyāvastuni pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:333: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena sarvākārāṇi paṃca cakṣuṃṣi niṣpādayitukāmena
XXpplg1__u:334: māṃsacakṣur divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur niṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
XXpplg1__u:335: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dakṣiṇasyāṃ (LPG 14r) paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tān sarvān divyena cakṣuṣā draṣṭukāmena yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śrotukāmena teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñātukāmena |
XXpplg1__u:336: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvayogasahagatāṃ bodhisatvacaryām anusmartukāmena teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anekavidham ṛddhividhivikurvitaṃ saṃdraṣṭukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:337: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yan te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ śrutvānācchedyena smṛtibalādhānena sandhārayitukāmena yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha etasminn antare sarvam avipraṇāśayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:338: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāṇi ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhīś ca pariniṣpādayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit tathāgatena bhāṣitaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānanidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyāvadānopadeśādbhutadharmā yac chrāvakair na śrutaṃ tat sarvaṃ paryavāptukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:339: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yat kiṃcit pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yat kiṃcit sarvabuddhair bhagavadbhir bhāṣitaṃ bhāṣyate bhāṣiṣyate tat sarvaṃ
XXpplg1__u:340: śrotukāmenodgrahītukāmena (LPG 14v) dhārayitukāmena paryavāptukāmena pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitukāmena tatra ca tathatvāya pratipattukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam*
XXpplg1__u:341: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhākāratamisrā lokāntarikā aghā aghasphuṭāḥ yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ maheśākhyāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau na bhāsete na tapato na virocete tāḥ sarvāḥ avabhāsayitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* // evan dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu yā
XXpplg1__u:342: andhākāratamisrās tāḥ sarvā avabhāsayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:343: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra yāvantaḥ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdas tatra lokadhātuṣu tān sarvasatvān buddhadharmasaṃghaśabdāṃc chrāvayitukāmena samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* // evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu : //
XXpplg1__u:344: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra ye pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv andhāḥ satvās te mamānubhāvena cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi drakṣyanti badhirāḥ śrotreṇa śabdāṃ śroṣyanti unmattāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabhante sma |
XXpplg1__u:351: śikṣitavyam* // kim iti (LPG 15r) ye tatra samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣv akṣaṇāpāyagatāḥ satvā
XXpplg1__u:352: nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā te mamānubhāvena tataś cyavitvā mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilapsyante |
XXpplg1__u:353: sarvāṃś ca tān satvāṃc chīle pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena srotaāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhatve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:354: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena tathāgateryāpathaṃ śikṣitukāmena tathāgatacaryācāritraviśuddhiṃ tathāgatasya jñānapūrvaṃgamakāyakarmavakkarmamanaskarmapariśuddhiṃ śikṣitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:355: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ nāgāvalokitam avalokayeyaṃ kim
XXpplg1__u:356: ity ahaṃ mahāsiṃhavijṛṃbhitena vijṛmbheyaṃ kim ity aham amoghavikrāmitayā vikrāmeyaṃ kim ity ahaṃ caturaṃgulamātreṇa mahāpṛthivīm aspṛśan gaccheyaṃ |
XXpplg1__u:357: kim ity ahaṃ sahasrapatreṣu pādmeṣu pādatalau nikṣipan gaccheyaṃ pādatalasanniśṛtān prāṇino aviheṭhayan* kim ity ahaṃ
XXpplg1__u:358: sahasrāracakratalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ vicitrayan gaccheyam // kim ity ahaṃ
XXpplg1__u:359: samantāc cakrapramāṇamātraṃ mahāpṛthivyāḥ parivartayeyaṃ caṃkrame caṃkramyeya kim ity ahaṃ sarvāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anucaṃkramyamāṇaḥ pṛthivīrajasā nānulipyeya |
XXpplg1__u:360: kim iti me ekaṃ vā yojanaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā |
XXpplg1__u:361: paṃca vā daśa vā viṃśatir vā tṛṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā paṃcāśad vā yojanaśataṃ vā |
XXpplg1__u:364: aprameyāṇi vā asaṃkhyeyāni vā acintyāni vā |
XXpplg1__u:368: 'nucaṃkramyamāṇasya na kāyaklame na cittam iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
XXpplg1__u:369: śikṣitavyam* // kim ity aham adhastāt kramatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ
XXpplg1__u:370: cakrabhyāṃ raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pramuṃcan* sarvākṣaṇāpāyaduḥkhāni praśamayya sarvasatvān sukhitān kuryām iti bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:371: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ caturmahārājakāyikair devair yāvad akaniṣṭhair anekair devakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto
XXpplg1__u:373: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam*
XXpplg1__u:374: kim iti me bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣīdataś cāturmahārājakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā duṣyasaṃstaraṃ kuryur iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:375: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ vyupaparīkṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya gacchato niṣaṇṇasya śayānasya sa pṛthivīpradeśo vajramayaḥ saṃtiṣṭheta |
XXpplg1__u:377: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam upaparīkṣitavyam* kim ity ahaṃ yatraiva divase 'bhiniṣkrameyaṃ
XXpplg1__u:378: tatraiva divase 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tatraiva divase dharmacakraṃ pravartayeyaṃ pravartayataś cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ
XXpplg1__u:379: virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśudhyet* aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃm anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimucyeran* aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ satvā 'vaivartikā (LPG 16r) bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:380: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam* kim ity me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhavet*
XXpplg1__u:381: ekadharmadeśanayāprameyāsaṃkhyeyā ekāsanikā arhanto bhaveyur bodhisatvā mahāsatvā sarve avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
XXpplg1__u:382: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇo bodhisatvasaṃgho bhavet* amitaṃ cāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhavet* amitā prabhāsaṃpad bhaved iti prajñāpāmitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* kim iti me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre rāgadveṣamohaśabdo 'pi na bhaved iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* //
XXpplg1__u:383: sarvasatvā evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhaveyuḥ sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu brahmacaryaṃ sādhv avihiṃsā sarvaprāṇibhūteṣu |
XXpplg1__u:384: kiṃ me parinirvṛtasya saddharmāntardhānaśabdo 'pi na bhavet tena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* // kim iti me saha śravaṇamātreṇa nāmadheyasya gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvā niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
XXpplg1__u:385: tena śāradvatīputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam* // yasmiṃc chāradvatīputra samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān guṇān utpādayati |
XXpplg1__u:386: tasmin samaye āttamanaskā bhavaṃti catvāro mahārājā vayam atra catvāri pātrāṇi pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yāni paurvakair mahārājaiḥ paurvakeṣu tathāgateṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni |
XXpplg1__u:387: āttamanaskā bhavanti trāyastriṃśā devā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ āttamanaskā bhavanti paranirmitavaśavartino devā vayam asyopasthānaparicaryāṃ (LPG 16v)
XXpplg1__u:388: kariṣyāma evam āsurāḥ kāyāḥ parihāsyaṃte divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante |
XXpplg1__u:389: āttamanaskā bhavanti brahmakāyikā devā ābhāsvarā śubhakṛtsnā bṛhatphalā avṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā āttamanaskā bhavanti aghaniṣṭhā devā vayam enam adhyeṣiṣyāmahe dharmacakrapravartanāya yasmin samaye śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir āttamanaskās tasmin* samaye bhavanti kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca vayam asya mahāsatvasya mātāpitarau bhaviṣyāmo //
XXpplg1__u:391: āttamanaskā bhavanti catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devā bodhisatvasyāmaithunasaṃyogaprasthānatāyai sa punar brahmacārī bhavati satvānāṃ bodhiniyojanatāyai na saṃyojanīyair dharmaiḥ saṃyujyate sa evaṃ praṇidadhāti |
XXpplg1__u:392: prathamacittotpādaṃ mayopādāya brahmacāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ nābrahmacāriṇā // tat kasya hetoḥ kāmāṃ khalu punaḥ pratiṣevamāṇasya
XXpplg1__u:396: // tasmāt tarhi bodhisatvena mahāsatvena brahmacāriṇaivābhiniṣkramyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā nābrahmacāriṇā : // evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad
XXpplg1__u:397: avocat* kiṃ punar bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāvaśyaṃ bhāryaputraduhitṛbhir bhavitavyam* bhagavān āha |
XXpplg1__u:398: keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhir bhavitavyam* na bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ keṣāṃcid avaśyaṃ mātāpitṛbhāryāputraduhitribhir bhavitavyam* keṣāṃcic chāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya
XXpplg1__u:399: brahmacaryaṃsamādānaṃ bhavati (LPG 17r) te nityaṃ kumārabhūtā eva yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante kecit punaḥ bodhisatvā
XXpplg1__u:400: mahāsatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipākāya paṃca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante |
XXpplg1__u:401: kecit punaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāpratilabdhā apagatakāmakleśās te satvaparipākāya kāmaguṇaparibhogaṃ cotpādayanti na ca paribhuṃjante |
XXpplg1__u:402: // tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra dakṣo māyākāro māyākārāntevāsī vā suśikṣito māyāvidyāsamyogajñāne sa paṃca kāmaguṇān abhinirmāya taiḥ paṃcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ramamāṇaṃ krīḍantaṃ paricārayaṃtam ātmānam upadarśayet* tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu tena māyākāreṇa vā māyākārāntevāsinā vā paṃca kāmāmaguṇāḥ paribhuktā bhaveyur āha |
XXpplg1__u:404: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvā mahāyānamāyāsuśikṣitā māyopamadharmatāvihārapratilabdhāḥ sarvakleśavigatā vineyasatvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāvaśena kāmaguṇabhogaṃ copadarśayanti na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṃjyante |
XXpplg1__u:405: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti na lipyaṃte anena paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ kāmānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣante |
XXpplg1__u:406: ādīptāḥ kāmā jugupsitāḥ kāmā vadhakāḥ kāmāḥ pratyarthikāḥ kāmāḥ pratyamitrāḥ kāmāḥ evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ satvānāṃ paṃcabhyaḥ kāmaguṇebhyo vivecanārthaṃ vicchandanārthaṃ paṃca kāmaguṇān
XXpplg1__u:408: na ca tair mādyanti na pramādyanti |
XXpplg1__u:409: na kāmahetor na kāmanidānaṃ (LPG 17v) pāpaṃ karmādhyavasyanti |
XXpplg1__u:411: chāradvatiputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ punar bhagavan
XXpplg1__u:412: bodhisatvena mahāsatvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam* bhagavān āha |
XXpplg1__u:413: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatva iti na samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:421: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānam api na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:422: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa bodhisatvo nāmasvabhāvena śunyaḥ na śunyatayā rūpaṃ śunyaṃ na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā na śunyatayā vijñānaṃ śunyam* nānyatra rūpāc chunyatā
XXpplg1__u:423: nānyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānāc chunyatā |
XXpplg1__u:424: śunyataiva rūpaṃ śunyataiva vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ śunyataiva vijñānaṃ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhiḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatvaḥ nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta cchunyatā |
XXpplg1__u:425: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ |
XXpplg1__u:426: tathā hi māyopamaṃ rūpam vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā māyopamaṃ vijñānaṃ māyā ca nāmamātraṃ na deśasthā na pradeśasthā : asad abhūtaṃ vitathasamaṃ māyādarśanaṃ svabhāvarahitaṃ asvabhāvaś cānutpādaḥ anirodaḥ na hānir na vṛddhiḥ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānam evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utpādaṃ na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:434: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:435: bodhir iti bodhisatva iti yad ucyate tad api na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:436: tat kasya hetoḥ kṛtriman nāma pratipratidharman te kalpitā āgantukena nāmadheyenābhūtaparikalpitena vyavahṛyante // vyavahārāc cābhiniviśyante |
XXpplg1__u:437: tad bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na manyate |
XXpplg1__u:439: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ vyupaparīkṣate
XXpplg1__u:440: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhisatva iti nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta bodhir iti |
XXpplg1__u:441: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta buddha iti |
XXpplg1__u:443: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti |
XXpplg1__u:444: nāmamātram idaṃ yad uta rūpam iti |
XXpplg1__u:446: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ātmātmeti vyavahṛyate sa ca parigaveṣyamāṇo nopalabhyate |
XXpplg1__u:447: evaṃ satvo jīvaḥ poṣaḥ pudgalo manujo mānavaḥ kārakaḥ kārāpako vedako vedayitṛkaḥ utthāpakaḥ samutthāpako jānakaḥ paśyakaḥ sparśako vijānakaḥ sarva ete yathābhūtaṃ parigaveṣyamāṇāḥ sarveṇa sarvan nopalabhyante |
XXpplg1__u:450: // evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisatvan na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:456: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānan na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:458: tad api nāmaṃ na samanupaśyaty evaṃ caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathāgataprajñāṃ sthāpayitvā sarvās tadanyāḥ prajñā yāvat sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhavaty anupalambhaśunyatām (LPG 18v) upādāya |
XXpplg1__u:459: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa tad api na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:460: yenābhiniviśeta evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputrāyaṃ jaṃbudvīpaḥ paripūrṇo bhavec chāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ tadyathāpi nāma naḍavanaṃ vā veṇuvanaṃ vā ikṣuvanaṃ vā śaravaṇaṃ vā śālivanaṃ vā tilavanaṃ vā teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti |
XXpplg1__u:464: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy upaniśām api na kṣamate |
XXpplg1__u:465: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya yā prajñā sā sarvasatvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇārthāya pratyupasthitā //
XXpplg1__u:466: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yā ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā abhibhūya tiṣṭhati // tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra jambudvīpaḥ
XXpplg1__u:467: paripūrṇaḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ sacec chāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ paripūrṇo bhaved yuṣmādṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate // tiṣṭhatu śāradvatīputra trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sacec chāradvatīputra pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanasadṛśair bhikṣubhiḥ evan
XXpplg1__u:468: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ yā prajñā sā bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitāyāḥ (LPG 19r) prajñāyāḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvad upaniśām api na kṣamate |
XXpplg1__u:470: yeyaṃ bhagavaṃc chrāvakāṇāṃ prajñā srotaāpannasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāminaḥ arhataḥ yā ca pratyekabuddhasya bodhisatvasya tathāgatasya cārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya prajñā sarvās tāḥ prajñā abhedaḥ śunyatā viviktāḥ anutpādaprakṛtikāḥ svabhāvaśunyā na ca bhagavann abhedasya
XXpplg1__u:471: viviktasyānutpādasya svabhāvaśunyasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate |
XXpplg1__u:472: tat kathaṃ bhagavan yeyaṃ bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā sā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñām abhibhavati |
XXpplg1__u:474: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputra yena kāryeṇa bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitā prajñā pratyupasthitā mayā mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caratā sarvasatvānām arthaṃ kurvatā sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā api nu tena kṛtyena sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyupasthitā |
XXpplg1__u:477: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavaty asmābhir anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasatvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayitavyā āha |
XXpplg1__u:479: tad anenāpi te śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam* yeyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā yā ca bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñā imāṃ prajñām upanidhāyaiṣā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñā śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti |
XXpplg1__u:481: tat kiṃ manyase śāradvatīputrāpi nu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām evaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
XXpplg1__u:483: abhisaṃbuddhyāparimāṇān aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti āha |
XXpplg1__u:486: mayā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇāḥ satvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāḥ // tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra khadyotakasya prāṇikajātasya naivaṃ bhavaty aham ābhayā jambudvīpam avabhāsayeyaṃ mamābhayā jambudvīpaḥ sphuṭo bhavet* evam eva śāradvatīputra
XXpplg1__u:487: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvā yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān paripūryānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmaḥ // tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra sūryamaṇḍalam udāgacchat sarvajaṃbūdvīpam avabhāsena spharati |
XXpplg1__u:488: sarvajambudvīpam avabhāsena sphuṭīkaroti evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran satvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya daśa tathāgatabalāni paripūrya catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
XXpplg1__u:491: evam ukte āyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramyāvaivartikabhūmīm anuprāpnoti |
XXpplg1__u:494: āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat* iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo
XXpplg1__u:495: mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃc chunyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu (LPG 20r) dharmeṣu sthitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmī atikramya buddhabhūmim anuprāpnoti śāradvatīputra āha |
XXpplg1__u:496: katamasyāṃ bhagavan bhūmau sthitvā bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ dakṣiṇīyo bhavati |
XXpplg1__u:498: prathamacittotpādaṃ śāradvatīputropādāya bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaḥ atrāntarād bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām agro vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āgamya sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
XXpplg1__u:499: yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ paṃcānāṃ śikṣāpadānām aṣṭāṃgasamanvāgatasya poṣadhasya caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ paṃcānām abhijñānāṃ ṣaṇṇām anusmṛtīnāṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ paṃcānāṃ balānāṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṃgānām āryāṣṭāṃgasya mārgasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
XXpplg1__u:500: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
XXpplg1__u:501: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
XXpplg1__u:502: eṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ loke prādurbhāvāt* kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni prajñāyante |
XXpplg1__u:504: cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ brahmakāyikā devā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante |
XXpplg1__u:506: srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ anāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisatvās tathāgatā 'rhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke prajñāyante |
XXpplg1__u:508: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati bhagavān āha |
XXpplg1__u:510: paryāyeṇa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo dakṣiṇāṃ śodhayati |
XXpplg1__u:511: tat kasya hetoḥ atyantapariśuddhā śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dakṣiṇā |
XXpplg1__u:512: tathā hi dāyakaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kasya dāyakaḥ anekeṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yad uta daśānāṃ kuśalānāṃ karmapathānāṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ |
XXpplg1__u:514: kathaṃ yujyamāno bhagavan bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti veditavyaḥ bhagavān āha |
XXpplg1__u:515: iha śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo rūpaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ saṃjñāśunyatāyāṃ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
XXpplg1__u:516: punar aparaṃ cakṣuḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ rūpaśabdagandharasasparśadharmaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ cakṣurdhātuśunyatāyāṃ rūpadhātuśunyatāyāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ
XXpplg1__u:517: yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ evaṃ śrotradhātuśunyatāyāṃ śabdadhātuśunyatāyāṃ śrotravijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ ghrāṇadhātuśunyatāyāṃ gandhadhātuśunyatāyāṃ ghrāṇavijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ jihvādhātuśunyatāyāṃ rasadhātuśunyatāyāṃ jihvāvijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ kāyadhātuśunyatāyāṃ sparśadhātuśunyatāyāṃ kāyavijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ manodhātuśunyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuśunyatāyāṃ manovijñānadhātuśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ duḥkhaśunyatāyāṃ samudayaśunyatāyāṃ nirodhaśunyatāyāṃ mārgaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ skandhaśunyatāyāṃ dhātuśunyatāyāṃ āyatanaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ avidyāśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ saṃskāraśunyatāyāṃ vijñānaśunyatāyāṃ nāmarūpaśunyatāyāṃ (LPG 21r)
XXpplg1__u:518: ṣaḍāyatanaśunyatāyāṃ sparśaśunyatātāyāṃ vedanāśunyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāśunyatāyām upādānaśunyatāyāṃ bhavaśunyatāyāṃ jātiśunyatāyāṃ jarāmaraṇaśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmaśunyatāyām yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:519: | ye kecit saṃjñāgatāḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
XXpplg1__u:520: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavya evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ // sa ābhir daśabhiḥ śunyatābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na tāvad yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā
XXpplg1__u:522: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:523: na rūpam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:524: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpādadharmi vā nirodhadharmi vā samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:525: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:526: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:527: na rūpaṃ vedanayā sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:528: na vedanā saṃjñayā na saṃjñā saṃskārair na saṃskārā vijñānena sārdhaṃ samavasarantīti samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:529: na vijñānaṃ saṃskāraiḥ sārdhaṃ samavasaratīti samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:530: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi na sa kaścid dharmaḥ kenacid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasarati na visarati
XXpplg1__u:531: // na yujyate na viyujyate prakṛtiśunyatām upādāya |
XXpplg1__u:532: yā śāradvatīputra rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpaṃ yā vedanāśunyatā na sā vedanā |
XXpplg1__u:536: tathā hi śāradvatīputra yā rūpaśunyatā na sā rūpayati |
XXpplg1__u:542: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi śāradvatīputrānyad rūpam anyā śunyatā nānyā śunyatānyad rūpam* rūpam eva śunyatā śunyataiva rūpam* evaṃ nānyā vedanānyā śunyatā |
XXpplg1__u:548: yā śāradvatīputra śunyatā na sā utpadyate na nirudhyate |
XXpplg1__u:551: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā yā notpadyate na nirudhyate |
XXpplg1__u:554: nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā : na tatra rūpaṃ na vedanā na
XXpplg1__u:555: saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na cakṣur na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvā kāyo na manaḥ na rūpaṃ na śabdo na gandho na raso na sparśo na dharmāḥ na tatra skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na tatra cakṣurdhātur na rūpadhātur na cakṣurvijñānadhātur na śrotradhātur na śabdadhātur na śrotravijñānadhātuḥ na ghrāṇadhātur na gandhadhātur na ghrāṇavijñānadhātur na jihvādhātur na rasadhātur na jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ na kāyadhātur na spraṣṭavyadhātur na
XXpplg1__u:556: kāyavijñānadhātur na manodhātur na dharmadhātur na manovijñānadhātur na tatrāvidyā nāvidyānirodhaḥ na saṃskārā nna saṃskāranirodhaḥ na vijñānaṃ na vijñānanirodhaḥ na nāmarūpaṃ na nāmarūpanirodhaḥ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ na sparśo na sparśanirodhaḥ na vedanā na vedanānirodhaḥ
XXpplg1__u:557: na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ nopādānaṃ nopādānanirodhaḥ na bhavo na bhavanirodhaḥ na jātir na jātinirodhaḥ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇanirodhaḥ na duḥkhaṃ na samudayo na nirodho na mārgaḥ na prāptir nābhisamayaḥ na srotaāpanno na srotaāpattiphalaṃ na sakṛdāgāmī (LPG 22r)
XXpplg1__u:558: na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmī nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhan nārhatvam* na pratyekabodhir na pratyekabuddhaḥ na tatra mārgākārajñatā na bodhisatvaḥ
XXpplg1__u:559: na tatra bodhir na buddhaḥ evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:560: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:561: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:562: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:563: na cakṣur yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:564: na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyaṃ na mano yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:565: na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:566: na śabdaṃ na gandhaṃ na rasaṃ na sparśaṃ na dharmān na cakṣurdhātuṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:567: na rūpadhātuṃ na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ yāvan na manodhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ na manovijñānadhātuṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:568: na smṛtyupasthāneṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:569: na samyakprahāṇeṣu na riddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṃgeṣu na mārge yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:570: yāvan na daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu na caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu na catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:571: yāvan na sarvajñatāyāṃ na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ yukta iti vā ayukta iti vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:572: anenāpi śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukto yukta iti vaktavyaḥ sarvadharmāyogāviyogatām (LPG 22v) upādāya |
XXpplg1__u:573: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śunyatāṃ śunyatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:576: nānimittayogam* nāpraṇihitam apraṇihitena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:578: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi śunyatā na yogo na viyogaḥ evam ānimittam apraṇihitaṃ na yogo na viyogaḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśunyatām avatarati |
XXpplg1__u:579: evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:580: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:581: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:582: tathā hi pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:583: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:584: tathā hy aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:585: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:586: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:587: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannair yojayati na viyojayati
XXpplg1__u:588: tathā hi pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannāny eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:589: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:591: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntenāparāntena vā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:592: na pūrvāntam aparāntaṃ vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:595: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ (LPG 23r) prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti
XXpplg1__u:597: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:601: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati
XXpplg1__u:603: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena
XXpplg1__u:604: | evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
XXpplg1__u:606: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayiṣyati |
XXpplg1__u:607: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:608: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:609: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:610: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati
XXpplg1__u:611: | evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā
XXpplg1__u:613: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:614: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:615: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:616: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:617: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:618: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:619: (LPG 23v) tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:620: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:621: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:623: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:624: // na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:625: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:626: // na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:627: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:628: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:629: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:630: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:631: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:632: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:633: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:634: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:635: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:637: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatiputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:638: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:639: tathā hi dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati
XXpplg1__u:640: | evaṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na dhyānapāramitāṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:641: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:642: evaṃ na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇardhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:643: evan na daśa tathāgatabalāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida (LPG 24r) nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:644: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:645: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:646: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:647: na sarvajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:648: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:649: na bodhiṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:650: na boddhyā sarvajñatāṃ yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:651: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:652: sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati |
XXpplg1__u:653: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
XXpplg1__u:654: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhāva iti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati |
XXpplg1__u:655: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na vijñānaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati
XXpplg1__u:657: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evan na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati |
XXpplg1__u:658: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati
XXpplg1__u:659: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati |
XXpplg1__u:663: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati |
XXpplg1__u:667: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti (LPG 24v) yojayati
XXpplg1__u:669: na rūpaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:670: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti vā yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:671: na rūpaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate
XXpplg1__u:672: | na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam
XXpplg1__u:674: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:675: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate
XXpplg1__u:676: na rūpam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyata iti vā yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:677: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyaya iti vā yujyate
XXpplg1__u:680: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:682: na rūpaṃ sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:683: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate |
XXpplg1__u:684: na rūpam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate |
XXpplg1__u:685: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate
XXpplg1__u:688: caratīti ca na carati ceti nopaiti |
XXpplg1__u:689: naiva carati ca na caratīti nopaiti |
XXpplg1__u:690: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
XXpplg1__u:691: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
XXpplg1__u:692: na dānapāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
XXpplg1__u:694: na satvaparipākahetoḥ na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ na daśānāṃ
XXpplg1__u:698: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
XXpplg1__u:701: na śunyatāśunyatāyā na mahāśunyatāyā na paramārthaśunyatāyā na saṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nāsaṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nātyantaśunyatāyā |
XXpplg1__u:710: na dharmadhātor na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
XXpplg1__u:711: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedaṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:712: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ // sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
XXpplg1__u:713: na divyasya śrotrasya na paracittajñānasya na pūrvanivāsānusmṛter nardhipādānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati |
XXpplg1__u:714: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
XXpplg1__u:715: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavaty aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi // evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi na cāsyaivaṃ (LPG
XXpplg1__u:716: 25v) bhavati yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante tat sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi |
XXpplg1__u:717: ahaṃ tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ jñāsye |
XXpplg1__u:719: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā tāṃ satvāṃś cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannāṃś ca drakṣyāmi |
XXpplg1__u:721: // evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ // evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ
XXpplg1__u:723: yāny api kānicil laukikalokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāny api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanty anābhogenāparikalpitāni
XXpplg1__u:724: ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto ye ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā bhagavantas taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pated iti
XXpplg1__u:725: | ye ca catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvamm ārakṣanti mā haiva kaścid bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāntarāyaṃ
XXpplg1__u:726: kārṣīt* ye ca kecit kāyikā rogās te 'pi tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi dharme sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavanti
XXpplg1__u:727: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvān maitryā spharati |
XXpplg1__u:728: // evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:729: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukha samādhimukhāni pratibhānapratisaṃvinmukhāny āmukhībhavanti |
XXpplg1__u:732: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir na kadācid virahito bhavati |
XXpplg1__u:734: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati
XXpplg1__u:735: asti kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā |
XXpplg1__u:738: tathā hi sa tad dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:740: sameyād vā na sameyād vā : evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
XXpplg1__u:741: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati * kaccid ahaṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vābhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya hetor na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddho nābhisaṃbudhyate |
XXpplg1__u:743: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:744: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:745: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:746: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dharmadhātor dharmāṇāṃ ca nānākaraṇaṃ karoti |
XXpplg1__u:747: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati // dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya
XXpplg1__u:748: | tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati |
XXpplg1__u:749: yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātuṃ śunyam iti yojayati |
XXpplg1__u:751: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ
XXpplg1__u:752: (LPG 26v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati |
XXpplg1__u:758: evaṃ na śrotradhātuṃ na śabdadhātuṃ na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na ghrāṇadhātuṃ na gandhadhātuṃ na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na jihvādhātuṃ na rasadhātuṃ na jihvāvijñānadhātum |
XXpplg1__u:767: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ śunyatāyāṃ śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati |
XXpplg1__u:770: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecic chāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitāyogas teṣām agrya-m-ākhyāyate |
XXpplg1__u:771: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta-m-ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttara eṣa yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śunyatānimittāpraṇihitayoga |
XXpplg1__u:772: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyākṛto vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ (LPG 27r)
XXpplg1__u:773: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāmm arthaṃ karoti na cāsyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujye 'ti vā viyujye 'ti vā māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyanty aham āsannībhūto vyākaraṇasya // ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi |
XXpplg1__u:774: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣye |
XXpplg1__u:775: // tat kasya hetos tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na vyatirekīkaroti |
XXpplg1__u:778: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cared yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākṛyeta |
XXpplg1__u:779: yo vānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta : tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na satvasaṃjñotpadyate |
XXpplg1__u:780: na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā na jānakapaśyakakārakavedakasaṃjñotpadyate |
XXpplg1__u:781: // tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantaṃ satvo nopalabhyate na nirudhyate |
XXpplg1__u:782: na hi satvasyotpādo na nirodhaḥ yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ kathaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati
XXpplg1__u:783: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ satvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati
XXpplg1__u:787: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ ayaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ paramo
XXpplg1__u:788: yogaḥ yas tadanyān yogān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati |
XXpplg1__u:789: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati |
XXpplg1__u:791: atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na mātsaryacittam utpādayati |
XXpplg1__u:792: na dauḥśīlyacittaṃ na vyāpādacittaṃ na kausīdyacittaṃ (LPG 27v) na vikṣepacittaṃ na dauṣprajñacittam utpādayati |
